headline: Has Adobe’s 38% Drop Created Opportunity Amid AI Push in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Adobe is a bargain or overpriced? You’re not alone. Many investors are debating whether now is the time to buy, hold, or stay away. The stock has experienced a rollercoaster year so far and is down 27.4% from January, with a 1-year decline of 38.0%. This signals significant market moves that could result from shifting expectations or changing perceptions of risk and growth potential. Recently, headlines have focused on Adobe’s continued push into AI-driven creative tools and its...
